platformAttributes.ios.editorialNotes.ta.k: 穿越多重宇宙，打造夢幻隊伍
Test your skills in the arena
帶領莫蒂軍團對抗邪惡瑞克

platformAttributes.ios.editorialNotes.st.k: Although this game has a totally different visual style, it feels exactly like Rick and Morty—thanks to the same hilarious writing that’s made the Adult Swim series so popular. As you navigate the characters’ ridiculous worlds, your job is to collect and fight dozens of Mortys from parallel universes. You’ll find yourself laughing out loud yet constantly captivated by the gameplay. Even if you don’t know a schmeckle from a Meseeks, you’ll delight in the unconventional humor and gripping turn-based combat.

platformAttributes.ios.editorialNotes.sh.k: Zip through the multiverse to catch all the Mortys in this personality-packed RPG.
